name: simple-link-aggregator
description: A simple link aggregator built on AppScript

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch ../src --exec 'npm run build && npm run serve' -e ts,css,js,html
scripts.watch-google: nodemon --watch src --watch ../src --exec 'npm run build && npm run serve-google' -e ts,css,js,html
scripts.test: npx playwright test && npx playwright test -c playwright_serial.config.ts
